name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker ran a malicious script that connected to a remote server.

parallel--d015c6ba-efa8-4ae4-b84e-4b4b43.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--d015c6ba-efa8-4ae4-b84e-4b4b43.description: Execute multiple mitigation strategies in parallel.

action--0c085832-64b3-4fb2-85cc-1a3fd921.name: Kill malicious script process
action--0c085832-64b3-4fb2-85cc-1a3fd921.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

action--6db12e4e-6b0f-466e-82c1-aec43ef1.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--6db12e4e-6b0f-466e-82c1-aec43ef1.description: Block all inbound and outbound traffic to and from the affected host.

commands.command: iptables -A INPUT -s host-42 -j DROP; iptables -A OUTPUT -s host-42 -j DROP

action--7c5f4618-e515-4e14-bde9-8fa5c209.name: Run a malware scan
action--7c5f4618-e515-4e14-bde9-8fa5c209.description: Perform a malware scan on the affected system.

while-condition--9e1b0c66-f5d5-44c1-9337.name: Repeat malware scan until clean
while-condition--9e1b0c66-f5d5-44c1-9337.description: Repeat the scan until the malware scan is clean.
